Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by San Diego in 2009...
Traded from San Diego to Houston on 1/31/2012 (Going to SDN: LF E. Hinske. Going to HOU: 2B M. Givens)...
Injured on 9/8/2012 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/12/2013, off Robert Breedlove (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/2013, off Wei-Yin Chen (STL)...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 4/22/2013...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/1/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Minnesota on 7/7/2019...
